# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version          | Supported          |
| ---------------- | ------------------ |
| v1.0.0 and older | :x:                |
| v2.x.x           | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

To report a vulnerability, please create a
[security advisory](https://github.com/owdex/owdex/security/advisories/new) in the
Security section on GitHub.
